entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 14.
